snippet: Kitschy re-creations of TV shows are not new, but some playwrights have loftier intentions, with results that include “Sticks and Bones” and “Laughter on the 23rd Floor.”
lead_paragraph: Kitschy re-creations of TV shows are not new, but some playwrights have loftier intentions, with results that include “Sticks and Bones” and “Laughter on the 23rd Floor.”

headline.seo: TV Shows Repurposed for a New Message Onstage
